pma:database.name: wda_crud
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `cadastro` ( `Nome` char(30) NOT NULL, `RG` int(11) NOT NULL, `CPF` int(11) NOT NULL, `Data nascimento` date NOT NULL, `Data Admissao` date NOT NULL, `Data Deslig.` date NOT NULL, `Condominio` int(11) NOT NULL, `Bloco` int(11) NOT NULL, `Apartamento` int(11) NOT NULL, `Responsavel` char(30) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
